Category.Name: Grand Strategy
Category.Description: A huge, slow and strategic war game.

Category.Name: MMO
Category.Description: A massively multiplayer online persistent game.

Feature.Name: Text-based
Feature.Description: Make the player type a novel to complete the game.

Feature.Name: Keyboard input
Feature.Description: The player can use a keyboard to control the game.

Feature.Name: Mouse input
Feature.Description: The player can use a mouse to control the game.

Feature.Name: 2D graphics
Feature.Description: Render the screen in 2D using sprites.

Feature.Name: 3D graphics
Feature.Description: Render the screen in 3D.

Feature.Name: HD graphics
Feature.Description: Render up to 1920x1080.

Feature.Name: UltraHD graphics
Feature.Description: Render up to 3840x2160, and give an option to scale the user interface to be larger.

Feature.Name: Graphics benchmark
Feature.Description: Allow a player to benchmark settings to see how well the game runs.

Feature.Name: Textures
Feature.Description: Apply textures to the 3D objects in the world.

Feature.Name: Lighting
Feature.Description: Render lights in the game world.

Feature.Name: Voxels
Feature.Description: Render the game using voxels; small 3D cubes, rather than pixels.

Feature.Name: VR
Feature.Description: Virtual reality.

Feature.Name: Physics
Feature.Description: Simulation of real-world physics and gravity effects.

Feature.Name: Local multiplayer
Feature.Description: Multiplayer on the same computer.

Feature.Name: Online multiplayer
Feature.Description: Multiplayer across the internet.

Feature.Name: Deathmatch
Feature.Description: A game mode where every player must kill every other player as quickly as possible.

Feature.Name: Capture the flag
Feature.Description: A game mode where players score points for capturing an enemy flag and returning it to home base.

Feature.Name: Control points
Feature.Description: A game mode where players must control specific areas of the map for a period of time in order to win.

Feature.Name: Touch support
Feature.Description: Allows touch-based input.

Feature.Name: FMV cutscenes
Feature.Description: A full motion video (FMV) is a video game narration technique that relies upon pre-recorded video files

Feature.Name: 3D cutscenes
Feature.Description: Reflect player choices in the story by rendering cutscenes in realtime

Feature.Name: Joystick input
Feature.Description: Allows a game to be controlled by a joystick.

Feature.Name: Key rebinding
Feature.Description: Keys can be rebound to the user's preference.

Feature.Name: Controller input
Feature.Description: Allows a game to be controlled by a game controller.

Feature.Name: Controller remapping
Feature.Description: Controller buttons can be remapped.

Feature.Name: Steering wheel input
Feature.Description: Allows a racing game to be controlled by a steering wheel.

Feature.Name: Force feedback
Feature.Description: Racing a vehicle will provide resistance and movement from the steering wheel, corresponding to the road surface.

Feature.Name: Online patches
Feature.Description: Patches will provide updates after release.

Feature.Name: Machine learning
Feature.Description: The game's AI will learn from players and adapt.

Feature.Name: Scripting
Feature.Description: Allow scripts to control gameplay.

Feature.Name: Character designer
Feature.Description: Players can build their own characters from scratch.

Feature.Name: Save game
Feature.Description: Save a game to resume playing later.

Feature.Name: Cloud saves
Feature.Description: Save a game to the cloud instead of locally.

Feature.Name: Character levelling
Feature.Description: Game characters can gain levels by progressing in the game.

Feature.Name: Difficulty levels
Feature.Description: Allow players to customise game difficulty.

Feature.Name: Health bar
Feature.Description: Player or unit health is measured using a depleting bar, and the player dies when it reaches zero.

Feature.Name: Digital store
Feature.Description: Allows a game to appear on a digital store. Although not required, gamers will expect this feature and it will boost sales.

Feature.Name: Game modes
Feature.Description: The same game can be played in different modes, with different sets of rules and victory conditions.

Feature.Name: Replay system
Feature.Description: A match or session can be recorded and replayed to analyse or observe.

Feature.Name: Map
Feature.Description: Level map is uncovered as the player explores.

Feature.Name: Mini-map
Feature.Description: A small map appears in the corner of the screen to guide the player.

Feature.Name: Procedural generation
Feature.Description: Parts of the game such as enemies or levels are generated by the computer rather than designed by a human.

Feature.Name: Party system
Feature.Description: Players can form a party with other game characters.

Feature.Name: Quest system
Feature.Description: Players are given story-based quests to complete as objectives, and gain rewards.

Feature.Name: Quest dialog
Feature.Description: Quests have voiced dialog lines.

Feature.Name: Quest generator
Feature.Description: Extra quests are generated or varied by the computer, instead of being designed by a human.

Feature.Name: Multiple endings
Feature.Description: The game's storyline can end in different ways depending on player choices.

Feature.Name: Inventory system
Feature.Description: Player characters can maintain an inventory of items.

Feature.Name: Item purchase
Feature.Description: In-game items can be purchased with virtual currency, bought with real money.

Feature.Name: Loot boxes
Feature.Description: Players can exchange money for a random chance to get a specific item.

Feature.Name: Leader bonuses
Feature.Description: Military leader units can have bonus effects on other, regular units.

Feature.Name: Regenerating health
Feature.Description: Player health regenerates to maximum automatically instead of collecting a health pack.

Feature.Name: Character classes
Feature.Description: Player characters are of different "class" from one another, allowing different abilities for different players.

Feature.Name: Battle royale mode
Feature.Description: A game mode with a large number of players, and the last one to be eliminated is the winner.

Feature.Name: SSAO
Feature.Description: Screen space ambient occlusion approximates occlusion of light behind objects in a 3D scene for a more realistic lighting effect.

Feature.Name: HDAO
Feature.Description: High definition ambient occlusion is a higher definition variant of SSAO.

Feature.Name: HBAO+
Feature.Description: Horizon-based ambient occlusion is an advanced SSAO technique offering better visuals at a performance cost.

Feature.Name: ABAO
Feature.Description: Angle-based ambient occlusion is an advanced SSAO technique.

Feature.Name: VXAO
Feature.Description: Voxel-accelerated ambient occlusion is a technique utilizing voxels for occlusion effects.

Feature.Name: Anti-aliasing
Feature.Description: Anti-aliasing reduces the jagged lines in 3D scenes caused by displaying angled shapes using square pixels.

Feature.Name: MSAA
Feature.Description: Multi-sample anti-aliasing is a less blurry form of anti-aliasing that uses polygon detection.

Feature.Name: FXAA
Feature.Description: Fast approximate anti-aliasing uses a blur filter to vastly reduce jagged lines at the cost of a slightly blurry image.

Feature.Name: SMAA
Feature.Description: Spacial anti-aliasing is an advanced anti-aliasing technique using polygon detection with a blurring effect.

Feature.Name: TXAA
Feature.Description: Temporal anti-aliasing is an advanced form of anti-aliasing with huge anti-jagged-line benefits at a significant performance cost.

Feature.Name: Flight physics
Feature.Description: Aircraft follow real-world flight models and behave more realistically.

Feature.Name: World map
Feature.Description: The entire globe is simulated and traversable by players.

Feature.Name: 3D cockpit
Feature.Description: Aircraft cockpits are rendered in full 3D.

Feature.Name: ATC simulation
Feature.Description: Air traffic control is simulated within the game world.

Feature.Name: Cloud simulation
Feature.Description: Clouds appear in the workd and can move, affecting visibility and aircraft handling.

Feature.Name: Wind simulation
Feature.Description: Wind affects the aircraft controls and position.

Feature.Name: Weather simulation
Feature.Description: Weather like rain or snow is simulated in the game world.

Feature.Name: Real-world weather
Feature.Description: Real-time weather is used to determine the weather in the game.

Feature.Name: Air combat
Feature.Description: Aircraft have weapons and can attack one another.

Feature.Name: Realistic damage
Feature.Description: Aircraft damage is simulated according to laws of physics.

Feature.Name: Damage simulation
Feature.Description: Realistically represent damage and its effect on vehicles.

Feature.Name: Handling model
Feature.Description: Vehicle handling follows real-world aerodynamic principles.

Feature.Name: Tire model
Feature.Description: Tire wear, temperature, and type affect the handling of the vehicle.

Feature.Name: Pit stop
Feature.Description: Players can stop a vehicle in the pits and change tires or refuel.

Feature.Name: Vehicle audio
Feature.Description: Audio from real vehicles is recorded and simulated in the game.

Feature.Name: Flag rules
Feature.Description: The rules of racing, like no overtaking, and false starts, are simulated.

Feature.Name: 3D interior
Feature.Description: The cockpit and interior of the car are rendered fully in 3D with working gauges.

Feature.Name: Online lap times
Feature.Description: Players can post lap times and view those of others online.

Feature.Name: Online race leagues
Feature.Description: Players can join an online league to race with others in a season.

Feature.Name: Online safety rating
Feature.Description: Driving behaviour is tracked over multiple online races and shown as a rating to other players.

Feature.Name: Advanced AI drivers
Feature.Description: AI drivers use real-world racing techniques to race the player.

Feature.Name: Radar
Feature.Description: The cockpit contains a radar to show the position of nearby spaceships in 3D space.

Feature.Name: 3D ship cockpit
Feature.Description: The cockpit is rendered in 3D with working instruments.

Feature.Name: Orbital mechanics
Feature.Description: The player ship is affected by gravity from planets and other spacial bodies.

Feature.Name: Docking
Feature.Description: The player can dock a ship at a space station.

Feature.Name: Space combat
Feature.Description: Players can engage in combat with other spaceships.

Feature.Name: Spaceship damage
Feature.Description: Spaceships are damaged and react realistically.

Feature.Name: Friend list
Feature.Description: Players can add others as friends and meet up in the game world.

Feature.Name: Guilds
Feature.Description: Players can form guilds (clubs) online and play together.

Feature.Name: Raid system
Feature.Description: Players can attack a specific objective in a large group (a raid).

Feature.Name: Mounts
Feature.Description: Players can acquire a "mount" such as a horse or a car in order to travel across the game world more quickly.

Feature.Name: Themed events
Feature.Description: Limited-time special events occur during real-world holidays or other specific times in the game world.

Feature.Name: Item sets
Feature.Description: Items can be part of a set, giving a special bonus when all pieces are obtained.

Feature.Name: Grand map
Feature.Description: A map of the entire campaign.

Feature.Name: Real-time battles
Feature.Description: Battles are fought on a separate real-time battle map.

Feature.Name: Character diplomacy
Feature.Description: Diplomatic options with other characters allow wars, imprisonment and other political repercussions.

Feature.Name: Tactics management
Feature.Description: Players can prepare, store, and execute battle tactics.

Feature.Name: Historical figures
Feature.Description: Figures from real-world history appear in the game.

Feature.Name: Trade routes
Feature.Description: Trade routes can be established across the game map to allow distribution of in-game wealth.

Feature.Name: Hint system
Feature.Description: Players can get a hint for a puzzle if stuck.

Feature.Name: Hidden objects
Feature.Description: The player must find items from a list that are hidden within an on-screen picture.

Feature.Name: Reveal picture
Feature.Description: Players reveal a picture by removing pieces one at a time according to the puzzle logic.

Feature.Name: Tile match
Feature.Description: Players must uncover two tiles at a time, in an attempt to find a matching set, until all sets are revealed.

Feature.Name: Match three
Feature.Description: Players must attempt to swap objects on a grid in order to match three of the same type in a line.

Feature.Name: Physics puzzles
Feature.Description: Physics-based puzzles such as liquid or building blocks must be overcome.

Feature.Name: Action puzzles
Feature.Description: Puzzles are time-based and require some dexterity to complete.

Feature.Name: Word puzzles
Feature.Description: Solving puzzles involves using language skills.

Feature.Name: Puzzle RPG
Feature.Description: Combine puzzles with a persistent quest and character levelling.

Feature.Name: VR puzzles
Feature.Description: Players manipulate objects in virtual reality to solve puzzles.

Feature.Name: Mod support
Feature.Description: Allows modification of game files to create extra levels, game mechanics and more.

Feature.Name: UI editing
Feature.Description: Allows user interface and HUD elements to be modified with a mod tool.

Feature.Name: Level editing
Feature.Description: Allows editing of levels, or new levels, using a mod tool.

Feature.Name: Scenario editing
Feature.Description: Allows editing of scenarios, with different starting conditions or game rules, with a mod tool.

Feature.Name: Vehicle editing
Feature.Description: Allows editing of vehicles in a mod tool.

Feature.Name: Circuit editing
Feature.Description: Allows editing of racing circuits in a mod tool.

Feature.Name: Aircraft editing
Feature.Description: Allows editing of aircraft in a mod tool.

Feature.Name: Unit editing
Feature.Description: Allows editing of military units in a mod tool.

Feature.Name: Puzzle editing
Feature.Description: Allows editing of puzzles and creation of new puzzles in a mod tool.
